I'm not a fan of CounterStrike, & I originally purchased this to mount to Garry's Mod. However, putting my money's worth to it, I did play it. It's a arcade styled pvp game with tactical strategies & skill necessary to win. Put into perspective, I suck at it & the professionals can keep it. But for what it is, I can recommend it. It does get repetitive but that's all part of the game!

TL:DR; Recommend it

Que buen juego!

Counter-Strike: Source ,un muy buen juego FPS (First Person Shooter) que recomiendo bastante. Es el Counter-Strike normal, solo que a este gran juego se le pus√≥ graficos mejorados, en las armas, en los mapas y en personajes con el motor de gr√°fico Source, un motor de gr√°ficos f√≠sicos y realistas que su lanz√≥ inicialmente en junio de 2004 por Valve y que con esos gr√°ficos se hizo el Counter-Strike Source que se lanz√≥ inicialmente a comienzos de octubre del 2004 y un mes despues ,para el mercado, tambien se lanzaron otros juegos como el HALF-LIFE 2.

Este juego contiene:

+Modo multijugador
+Un jugador vs. bots

+Divertido y adictivo
+Buena comunidad
+Buena jugabilidad

+Graficos Buenos (Source)

Lo malo:

+Puede tener errores o fallas de texturas
+Algunos Bugs, etc

Lo recomiendo bastante: 10/10

Very very great for people with laptops/pcs with lower specs. I, myself have a 2 gb ram, Intel Atom processor laptop with a lower-end graphics card, and this game runs pretty smoothly on it. Definitely recommend this game

Guten Abend liebe Zocker,

Genre: Ego-Shooter

+Pro:

+ unver√§ndertes, motivierendes Gameplay-Erlebnis
+ Teamplay-Aspekt steht im Vordergrund
+ ausgeglichenes, faires Waffen-Arsenal

+ angepasstes Bewegungssystem
+ sehr intuitive Steuerung im Spiel
+ Verst√§ndigung durch Radio-Messages oder Team-Speak
+ Objekte k√∂nnten durchschossen werden
+ kein Schutzschild mehr
+ KI der Geiseln verbessert
+ nette Physik-Engine
+ tolle Shader-Effekte
+ zahlreiche Spezial-Effekte
+ hochdetaillierte Texturen
+ aufw√§ndige Charaktere und Animationen
+ beeindruckende Soundkulisse mit Surround-Unterst√ºtzung

-Kontra:

- keine weiteren Charakter- Modelle
- keine tats√§chlichen Neuerungen
- teilweise umst√§ndliches Men√ºsystem
- einige alte Sound- Effekte
- leichte Physik- Problem

Fazit: Counter-Strike: Source ist ein klassischer Shooter und ist ein weiterer Meilenstein in der Counter-Strike-Reihe definitive Kaufempfehlung.

Counter Strike Source is in my opion one of the best CS on the market to date. Its got a load of community servers and if you like to surf this is the game for you.

Counter-Strike is one of my favourite video games since I was young , especially Counter-Strike : Source . Well , in my opinion , it's obviously better than Counter-Strike : Global Offensive as I had so much vivid experience , especially some of the maps . When I play this game , I always feel like I'm having a war against the opposing team in real life . Well , it's the most expensive Counter-Strike game among the four , but I would recommend active Steam users to buy because it's worth it . Yes , I would rate it 10 out of 10 a.k.a 100% . It's also the main source of alleviating my stress out of my body .
Why does this game cost more than CS: GO?
